channel.title: Kallysten Audiobooks
channel.itunes:subtitle: Paranormal romance stories
channel.itunes:author: Kallysten
channel.itunes:summary: Subscribe to this feed to receive sample chapters of my stories as well as complete novels and Short stories. Completed stories on this podcast are Aria and Will, and First Vision of Destiny. The current podcast is Baby Steps, a vampire romance story in which a vampire and Special Enforcer find themselves drawn to each other despite what they are. Visit my website for more stories http://original.kallysten.net
channel.description: Subscribe to this feed to receive sample chapters of my stories as well as complete novels and Short stories. Completed stories on this podcast are Aria and Will, and First Vision of Destiny. The current podcast is Baby Steps, a vampire romance story in which a vampire and Special Enforcer find themselves drawn to each other despite what they are. Visit my website for more stories http://original.kallysten.net
